#summary Installation Instruction for a correctly configured target PC
#labels Phase-Deploy

[Index]

= Introduction =

This page assumes that the target PC has all dependencies installed.

All Neurospaces packages can be downloaded and installed by themselves, based on autotools ('./configure', 'make', 'sudo make install').  There is a small issue with the Heccer package: its compilation depends on the NMC to be installed (where it should not).

The most easy way to do the installation, is by using the package installer, see below.

= Details =

Using the install script of the InstallerPackage:

  * Install the common Neurospaces packages (at this moment, the model container, heccer, ssp and the studio), from downloads.sourceforge.net, distribution build-37 (*please, modify 'build-37' to be the latest release available for download, at present it is 'build-37'*):
{{{
neurospaces_build --download-server downloads.sourceforge.net --src-tag build-37 --src-dir  /tmp/neurospaces/downloads --regex 'heccer|ssp|studio|model-container' --verbose --verbose --verbose
}}}
    Add a couple of '--verbose' options to see what is going on.
  * To uninstall you can use the same command line, and use the '--uninstall' option:
{{{
neurospaces_build --download-server downloads.sourceforge.net --src-tag build-37 --src-dir /tmp/neurospaces/downloads --regex 'heccer|ssp|studio|model-container' --verbose --verbose --verbose --uninstall --no-configure --no-compile --no-install
}}}
    Note that you must add the '--no-compile' option, otherwise things might break because of the compilation dependencies between the packages.
  * Or if you the sources still in your filesystem after a previous download:
{{{
neurospaces_build --no-compile --uninstall --regex 'model-container|heccer|ssp|studio' --src-tag build-37 --src-dir /tmp/neurospaces/downloads --verbose --verbose --verbose
}}}
    Note that you must add the '--no-compile' option, otherwise things might break because of the compilation dependencies between the packages.
